sub_title: Hockey trainer. Ready at Saxion. I started a new and challenging period with sufficient leisure time.
summary:
Physical educator, physiotherapist and health care & social work scientist. Experienced in coordinating clinical education for health care studies and in coordinating activities for internationalization in the health care domain.
Recent goals: developing cooperation to enable international student and staff mobility and international curriculum development, including synergy between social work and health care (education and research).

Specialties: Development and coordination of international cooperation in health care and health care education (nursing, physiotherapy, podiatry and management in care).

Coordinator and Organizer IP Self Management and Empowerment in Social work and Health care (SMESH) with Lahti, Cork, Frankfurt and Saxion.

Partner in European SOULBUS - Project to enhance intercultural competences for staff and supervisors in Health Care and Social Work

Vice president ENPHE (European Network of Physiotherapy in Hgher Education). Treasurer and PR/Website.

Chair Transition Committee to professionalize ENPODHE (European Network of Podiatry in Hgher Education), since conference Metropolia University Helsinki, March 2014.

projects.description:
BUILDING SOCIAL CAPITAL BY IMPROVING MULTICULTURAL COMPETENCE BETWEEN HEIs (HIGHER EDUCATION INSTITUTION) AND NPOs (NON-PROFIT-ORGANIZATION) IN THE FIELD OF SOCIAL, HEALTH CARE AND REHABILATION.

Jyväskylä UAS (Finland),
Lahti UAS (Finland),
College of Nursing Jesenice (Slovenia),
Health Care - Nursing - College Tartu (Estonia),
Faculty of Education and Rehabilitation Sciences, University of Zagreb (Croatia), and
Saxion UAS (the Netherlands).

profile_positions.description: Teacher in Physical Education and Physiotherapy (Bachelor and Master Programmes)
profile_positions.title: Senior Lecturer & Researcher

profile_positions.description: The research line strives to develop multi-disciplinary approaches to research and education on an international level. It is committed to forging multidisciplinary and multi-national networks to build capacity within the faculties of Health Care and Social Work of Saxion such that there are increasing opportunities for students to explore other cultures and systems, thereby enhancing their education and training. Inherent within this process is professional development. Opportunities for staff from within the two faculties to extend and enhance their professional and academic standing will be identified and actively pursued. The research line will also make every effort to develop applied research that reflects the way in which culture, policy and lifestyle in different countries impact on health and social care.
profile_positions.title: Chair-member Cross Borders Health Care and Social Work

profile_positions.description: For the third time one year Curriculum Leave of Absence till July 2019.
profile_positions.title: Curriculum Leave of Absence (3)

company.name: ENPHE (European Network of Physiotherapy in Higher Education)

profile_positions.company: ENPHE (European Network of Physiotherapy in Higher Education)
profile_positions.title: Vice President, Treasurer, student affairs ISB & Website/PR

profile_positions.description:
The goal of the Transition Committee is to prepare the implementation of a more professional, structural organization of Enpodhe (European Network of Podiatry in Higher Education) as discussed and presented in Helsinki 2014. This committee works for 1 year and will present their actions in Malaga conference March 2015. Aspects that will be addressed in this preparation are:

Executive Board (EB),
Secretarial support (including PR and website),
General Assembly (GA),
Conferences,
Working Groups (WG),
Student Body (SB),
Charter/Bylaws.

The Transition Committee was elected March 28th 2014 in Helsinki, during the Enpodhe meeting. Representatives from all countries form this committee.
profile_positions.title: Chair Transition Committee
President Policy Team "en pantouffle" Saxion, School of Health
